# webpack 源码分析

# 前言

本人平时学习及收集内容，欢迎参入一起讨论。

# 内容

# webpack配置文件vscode调试配置文件

"version": "0.2.0",
    "configurations": [
        {
            "type": "node",
            "request": "launch",
            "name": "启动程序",
            "skipFiles": [
                "<node_internals>/**"
            ],
            "program": "${workspaceFolder}/node_modules/webpack-dev-server/bin/webpack-dev-server.js",
            "args": ["--progress", "--inline", "--config", "build/webpack.demo.js"]
        }
    ]
